001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import java.time.Duration;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.Consumer;
006
007/**
008 * A record of a tool run.
009 *
010 * @param name the name of the tool
011 * @param args the arguments of the tool run
012 * @param thread the ID of the thread that ran the tool
013 * @param duration the duration of the tool run
014 * @param code the exit code of the tool run
015 * @param output the normal and expected output of the tool run
016 * @param errors the error message of the tool run
017 */
018public record ToolRun(
019    String name,
020    List<String> args,
021    long thread,
022    Duration duration,
023    int code,
024    String output,
025    String errors) {
026
027  /** {@return {@code true} if this response represents an errored tool call run} */
028  public boolean isError() {
029    return code != 0;
030  }
031
032  /** {@return {@code true} if this response represents a successful tool call run} */
033  public boolean isSuccessful() {
034    return code == 0;
035  }
036
037  /**
038   * {@return silently this instance if it represents a successful tool call run}
039   *
040   * @throws RuntimeException if {@link #isError()} returns {@code true}
041   */
042  public ToolRun requireSuccessful() {
043    if (isSuccessful()) return this;
044    var message = "%s returned code %d".formatted(name, code);
045    throw new RuntimeException(message);
046  }
047
048  public ToolRun visit(Visitor visitor) {
049    visitor.accept(this);
050    return this;
051  }
052
053  /** A consumer of a tool run instance. */
054  public interface Visitor extends Consumer<ToolRun> {
055
056    /** {@return a tool run visitor that does nothing} */
057    static Visitor noop() {
058      return run -> {};
059    }
060  }
061}
